Name: Captain Roeg Tharn
Backstory: A former battlefield commander now demoted to town guard, Roeg drinks too much and speaks too little. His eyes never stop scanning doorways, and he keeps a locket of his lost daughter tucked in his breastplate.

Name: Guard Elric Stone
Backstory: Veteran swordsman known for his brutal honesty and unmatched stamina. Rumored to have once slain a bandit captain with a broken stool.

Name: Guard Tamma Coil
Backstory: A slender archer who volunteers for night shifts. She sleeps little and always carries extra arrows dipped in wolf’s bane—just in case.

Name: Guard Brannik Leff
Backstory: Brannik is large, slow, and fiercely loyal. He once stood unmoving during a full riot, simply shielding a child until it passed.

Name: Guard Lysa Harl
Backstory: New to the force, Lysa is idealistic and struggles with orders that conflict with her morals. Keeps a prayer charm hidden beneath her helm.

Name: Guard Dorn Kray
Backstory: A gambler and cynic, Dorn joined the guard to avoid jail. He's always one step from disgrace, yet oddly effective when cornered.

Name: Guard Nirel Foss
Backstory: Raised in Karnstadt, Nirel knows every alley and backdoor. Works as unofficial scout and informant. Might have a deal with the Thieves' Ring.

Name: Guard Urek Sharr
Backstory: Silent and scarred, Urek is the executioner when duties demand it. He never speaks, but is known to hum lullabies.

Name: Guard Merec Dunn
Backstory: Once a tavern brawler, Merec joined the guard to clean up. Now channels his violence into his job—and it shows.

Name: Guard Fennic Quarr
Backstory: A charmer who knows the law better than his captain. Suspected of helping certain merchants avoid fines—for a price.

Name: Guard Velda Troon
Backstory: The oldest guard still on active duty, Velda fought in the Hill Wars and wears her medals beneath her cuirass. She mentors the youngest recruits.

Name: Jailer Thromm
Backstory: A hulking man with a calm demeanor, Thromm tends the cells and brews strong tea. He’s kind to prisoners, unless they scream too much.

Name: Jailer Reeva Morl
Backstory: Sharp-eyed and sarcastic, Reeva runs the records and interrogations. She takes pride in her orderliness and her hidden knife collection.
